tool_description: Monitors laboratory quality control by tracking QC sample results, instrument performance, and procedural compliance to ensure accurate test results.

test_method.description: Testing methodology or assay name being monitored

qc_level.description: QC sample level: normal, high, low, abnormal

control_value.description: Expected value for the QC control sample

measured_value.description: Actual measured value from QC control

error_messages: Invalid instrument ID: Instrument not found in system or not active.
Unrecognized test method: Test method not configured for QC monitoring.
Invalid QC level: QC level must be [normal, high, low, abnormal].
QC value out of range: Control or measured values are outside acceptable limits.
QC failure detected: Measured value exceeds acceptable deviation from control value.
usage: Provide instrument_id, test_method, qc_level, control_value, and measured_value to monitor quality control performance and detect analytical issues.

qc_status.description: QC result status: pass, fail, warning

deviation_percentage.description: Percentage deviation from expected control value

trend_analysis.description: Analysis of recent QC trends for this test method

next_qc_due.description: When next QC check is due
